data.title: Black Sea as a Battlefield: Ukraine’s Perspectives and Strategies in the Region
data.meta_description: The area encompassing the Black and Azov Seas holds immense strategic importance for Ukraine’s national interests. Since 2014, it has been a site of conflict for Ukraine due to Russia’s occupation and militarisation of Crimea, creeping occupation of the...
